root.name: You Are Empty
root.description: OverviewYou Are Empty is a first-person shooter that was developed by Digital Spray Studios and released in 2007. It takes place in Russia in 1955 during an alternate history where Stalin is in power. During his reign, human experimentation was undertaken, causing an outbreak of zombies and mutants.LevelsHospitalHospital 2KolhozKolhoz 2PlantPlant 2Old townTotalitarianismTotalitarianism 2City CouncilTramYardsCinemaCinema 2MetroMetro 2OperaRoofsDepotDepot 2Depot 3UtopiaReactorFinalEnemiesMental retardZombie nurseConstruction workerFireman zombieFlamethrower zombieMutant DogTerroristShotgun guyNailgun dudeHammerfallKolhoz peasantMutant HenSteelworkerPalace GuardSewer ratBehemothFlyerToad MutantRed Army soldierElectrocutorWeaponsWrenchMauser pistolShotgunNailgunPrecision riflePPS machinegunMolotov-cocktailSniper rifleElectrogunFlamethrowerMaxim machinegunHand grenade
